plot: "Shooting LA" is eight short stories about twelve people, all of them bound together by random sniper bullets, a provocative narrative, and a conclusion emphasizing wonder, loss and love.
title: Shooting LA
plot_es: "Shooting LA" is eight short stories about twelve people, all of them bound together by random sniper bullets, a provocative narrative, and a conclusion emphasizing wonder, loss and love.
